tours.title: Xitoyni kashf eting
tours.desc: Xitoy: qadimiy tarix, Buyuk devor, innovatsiyalar, rang-barang madaniyat.

tours.title: Oroldagi dam olish
tours.desc: Ajoyib orol manzaralarida tinchlikni his qiling.

tours.desc: Zamonaviy hayot va qadimiy an'analar mamlakati.

tours.title: Tropik Tailand
tours.desc: Chiroyli plyajlarda dam oling va mazali taomlarni tatib ko'ring.

tours.title: Sehrli Turkiya
